Articles.Content:
A funny thing happened on the way to the Mun, Space turned BLUE! looks like a sound stage.

![html>]()
This would go in the modded support section, not the challenges section.

Looks like your using the Scatterer Mod. If you are its currently very buggy and WIP ( Work In Progress ) and you should expect things like that to happen. If it you are using scatterer it could also conflicting with FASA ( I'm not sure if you're using it ) and other mods you may have. I would suggest posting this in the Mod Thread so that the Mod Developer can see this.

If you invert the colors, rotate 86 degrees to the left, zoom & enhance, you can see part of the stage lights.

/itsaconspiracy

Hahahaha priceless!

I can see that glitch being a mod itself ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)
